com.pushtechnology.diffusion.transform.adder

Interface TopicAdderBuilder<S,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - The type of value understood by the topic
    T - The type of value updates are provided as
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BoundSafeTopicAdderBuilder<S,T>, BoundTopicAdderBuilder<S,T,U>, BoundTransformedTopicAdderBuilder<S,T>, SafeTopicAdderBuilder<S,T>, UnboundSafeTopicAdderBuilder<S,T>, UnboundTopicAdderBuilder<S,T,U>, UnboundTransformedTopicAdderBuilder<S,T>
    Deprecated. 
    since 2.0.0

    @Deprecated
public interface TopicAdderBuilder<S,T>
    Builder for TopicAdders.
    Author:
    Push Technology Limited
